meta_homepage_title: Independent Developer - Custom Apps & Honest Pricing
meta_homepage_description: Independent developer. No agency fees! I build custom apps and websites with high performance. Transparent pricing and fast delivery.
hero_title: Custom Solutions Directly Built. Expert Work,
hero_description: I cut out the agency noise and focus entirely on building your custom website or app. Expect transparent pricing, dedicatedattention, and a straightforward path to launch.
bento_1_description: While I'm not a "Senior" developer with 20 years in the field, I bring maximum focus and an up-to-date knowledge of the latest, most efficient tech. You get reliable, clean code without paying forunnecessary legacy experience.
bento_2_description: I don't have an agency office or a sales teamâ€”your budget goes straight into the build, not into corporate costs.
bento_3_description: We define the scope clearly upfront, and I manage my time to ensure a rapid launch that's reliable, not just rushed.
bento_4_description: Whether you need a simple, solid marketing site or a mid-size web app that requires complex data handling, I build platforms that are flexible enough to meet your current needs and scale when your business is ready.
tools_title: The Modern Tech Stack I Master
tools_subtitle: A curated toolkit built for speed and scalability.
tools_instruction: Hover/Tap on any card to see how I use it.
tools_instruction_fallback: Hover/Tap on a tool for more details
tool_solidjs_description: I fell in love with SolidJS, and i'm planning to base all my future projects on it. Also thought about making my own components library
tool_tanstack_start_description: Not many people know this but, Tanstack Start is also compatible with SolidJS. I'm planning to use it alongside solidjs for full-stack applications.
tool_tailwindcss_description: This is my primary way of styling my projects although i sometimes use inline styles, just for reactive states.
tool_react_description: I started with React, maybe in 2022, it has been my go-to library because of its extensive ecosystem and community support, but it was just too much bloatware for me.
tool_nextjs_description: Well, after learning React, Next.js was my next step. I used it for my first full-stack application. It was a great experience, but again, alot of bloating.
tool_convex_description: I just started using Convex, and I love it, they recently got a 22M dollar funding, and I'm excited to see what they can do next.
tool_tanstack_query_description: Again, the team at Tanstack has made a SolidJS version of it so, i'm gonna use it where it's needed.
tool_drizzle_description: Right when i started working with databases, I started using Drizzle, and I really liked it, it's a great ORM for TypeScript.
tool_supabase_description: I've used Supabase for some projects, so I'm a little familliar with it but, I don't really liked it.
tool_postgresql_description: I've used this both in Uni, and some projects. It's a powerful and flexible database system. But i wanna build applications Fast, so i'm gonna mainly use Convex
tool_typescript_description: Well what can I say, i'm using it for everything, sometimes it gets a little bloated but it's great.
tool_javascript_description: Well, I can't say I use it, but, everything is built on it so, I am using it?
tool_css_description: Well I started with CSS, and so, it's just, very easy to use and flexible, and it's very powerful.
tool_romanian_description: Well I'm Romanian, and I believe I know it :)).
tool_english_description: I've got a C1 certificate at the Cambridge English Language Assessment so, I can definetly have a conversation about games with you.
tool_bun_description: I use bun everywhere, it's fast and efficient, both as a package manager, and as a runtime.
tool_github_description: I use Github for so long and I feel like I still don't know how to use it. But I like it alot.
tool_git_description: I mean, you can't have GitHub without Git can you?
tool_nodejs_description: Well, Node.js is Node.js, it's still used for alot of things, but I prefer Bun.
tool_turborepo_description: I love the idea of Turborepo, i think after I make my Component library, i'll use this for faster builds.
tool_pnpm_description: My second package manager was pnpm, it's fast and efficient. But I prefer Bun.
tool_npm_description: Well, this was the first package manager i used, so i'm still fond of it.
tool_figma_description: I use Figma alot, for UI/UX design, prototyping, and design systems. It's powerful, but it's also expensive.
tool_zed_description: I only started using it recently, I love it, the Zed agent is just, amazing, still needs some updates on Windows.
tool_vscode_description: I thinnk it's the best editor for web development, Alot of extensions and easy to use. Plus it's free, but the copilot is eh, sortof pricey.
tool_intellij_description: I used it for Java development in UNI, also tried making some minecraft mods :)
